panels.title: Detailed Percentages on total 3scale http connections

targets.expr: 100 * openresty_shdict_free_space{dict="init", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace"} / openresty_shdict_capacity{dict="init", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace"}
100 * openresty_shdict_free_space{dict="locks", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace"} / openresty_shdict_capacity{dict="locks", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace"}
